message.entry: "DisplayState" property must be 'expanded', 'collapsed' or 'expanded_on_top'.
"DisplayState" property must be 'icon_view' or 'list_view'.
"FavoritesEnabled" property accepts a logical value, true or false.
"GalleryItemRowCount" property accepts a value of 1, 2 or 3.
"GalleryItemTextLineCount" property accepts a value of 0, 1 or 2.
"GalleryItemWidth" property accepts a positive finite integer in the unit of pixels.
"MaxColumnCount" property accepts a positive finite integer.
"MinColumnCount" property accepts a positive finite integer.
"CollapsePriority" property accepts a non-negative finite integer.
"HorizontalAlignment" property must be 'left', 'center' or 'right'.
"Width" property accepts a positive finite integer in the unit of pixels.
"MaxHeight" property accepts a positive finite integer in the unit of pixels.
"Title" property accepts a character vector.
The "remove" method is intentionally disabled for this container object.
A "{0}" object cannot be added to a "{1}" object.
A "{0}" object cannot be removed from a "{1}" object.
A "{0}" object cannot be moved within a "{1}" object.
The specified object is not a child of the parent object.
The host id must be a DIV id in HTML.
"SelectedTab" property accepts a "Tab" object.
The first input argument of the "Gallery" constructor must be a "GalleryPopup" object.
"getChildByTag" method accepts a tag name.
"getChildByIndex" method accepts a valid index of 1-based integer.
Failed to locate the child with the specified tag.
Failed to locate the child with the specified index. It is out of bounds.
"findAll" method accepts a tag.
"find" method accepts a tag.
"contains" method accepts a string that is part of a tag.
Panel cannot be added to a Column whose parent is already a Panel.
Column cannot host more than 3 controls.
"Position" property accepts a vector of 4 positive finite integers (x, y, width, height) in the unit of pixels.
"Visible" property accepts a logical value, true or false.
"TextOverlay" property accepts a character vector.
"Icon" property accepts a "jpg" or "png" image filename on the MATLAB path.
Tab "{0}" not found.
TabGroup "{0}" not found.
"{0}" cannot be added to "{1}" after toolstrip is rendered.
"ShowSelection" property accepts true or false. If true, use "ToggleGalleryItem" only in the popup. Otherwise, use "GalleryItem" only in the popup.
"HideDisabledItems" property accepts true or false. If true, disabled GalleryItems will be hidden from the GalleryWidget's closed view until only disabled items remain.
"ColumnWidth" property accepts a real value.
"IconSize" property accepts a real value.
